text.text:
AR. AMIT KAPOOR
Senior Architect / Urban Design Specialist
Bengaluru, India | amit.kapoor@email.com | +91-9XXXXXXXXX
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Senior Architect with over 12 years of experience in architectural design, urban planning, and project execution
across residential, commercial, and mixed-use developments. Proven expertise in concept design, client
coordination, statutory approvals, and on-site execution. Strong focus on sustainable design practices, cost
optimization, and timely delivery of high-quality architectural solutions.
CORE SKILLS
(cid:127) Architectural Design & Planning
(cid:127) Urban Design & Master Planning
(cid:127) Sustainable & Green Building Design
(cid:127) Construction Documentation
(cid:127) Client & Consultant Coordination
(cid:127) Project Scheduling & Site Supervision
(cid:127) AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, Lumion
(cid:127) Building Codes & Regulatory Compliance
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Senior Architect – Horizon Design Studio (2018 – Present)
(cid:127) Lead architectural design and execution for residential and commercial projects ranging from 50,000 to 500,000
sq. ft.
(cid:127) Developed concept designs, detailed drawings, and 3D visualizations in coordination with clients and
consultants.
(cid:127) Managed statutory approvals with local authorities and ensured compliance with building codes and regulations.
(cid:127) Supervised on-site execution and resolved design and construction issues to ensure timely project delivery
within budget.

Architect – UrbanForm Architects (2012 – 2018)
(cid:127) Prepared detailed working drawings, BOQs, and construction documents for residential and commercial
projects.
(cid:127) Coordinated with structural, MEP, and landscape consultants for integrated project delivery.
(cid:127) Conducted regular site visits to monitor quality, progress, and adherence to design intent.
(cid:127) Assisted in sustainable design strategies including daylight analysis, material optimization, and energy-efficient
solutions.
KEY PROJECTS
(cid:127) Mixed-use Commercial Complex – 4,00,000 sq. ft.
(cid:127) Luxury Residential Tower – 32 storeys
(cid:127) Corporate Office Campus – LEED Gold Certified
EDUCATION
(cid:127) Bachelor of Architecture (B.Arch) – School of Planning & Architecture, Delhi
PROFESSIONAL AFFILIATIONS
(cid:127) Council of Architecture (COA), India
(cid:127) Indian Institute of Architects (IIA)
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
(cid:127) Strong presentation and visualization skills
(cid:127) Experience working on fast-track projects
(cid:127) Passionate about sustainable and context-driven design
